name: AI Risk Assessment
description: Assessment of risks to individuals and groups affected by AI system

name: AI Risk Treatment
description: Documentation and implementation of AI risk treatment decisions

name: Residual Risk Acceptance
description: Formal acceptance of residual AI risks by authorized personnel

name: AI System Impact Assessment
description: Assessment of potential impacts of AI system on individuals, groups, and society

name: Documentation of Impact Assessment
description: Recording and maintaining impact assessment results and decisions

name: Data Quality for AI
description: Ensuring data used for AI development and operation meets quality requirements

name: AI System Transparency
description: Providing appropriate transparency about AI system capabilities and limitations

name: AI Explainability
description: Enabling explanation of AI system outputs and decision-making processes

name: Third-Party AI Risk
description: Managing risks from third-party AI components, services, and data

name: AI Supply Chain
description: Ensuring AI supply chain integrity and security

name: Monitoring of AI Systems
description: Continuous monitoring of AI system performance and compliance

name: AI System Logging
description: Maintaining comprehensive logs of AI system operations and decisions

name: AI Incident Management
description: Procedures for managing AI-related incidents and near-misses

name: AI System Change Management
description: Controlled processes for changes to AI systems

name: AI Performance Evaluation
description: Regular evaluation of AI system performance against objectives
